description: This HTML file serves as the front-end interface for a Database Viewer web application. It includes embedded CSS for styling and JavaScript for dynamic interactions, such as loading databases, tables, and table data via API calls, and updating the DOM accordingly.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and renders them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list on user request.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the table list for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects, long text, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for better visualization.
